Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phoenix Suns are in a tailspin after suffering one of their worst losses of the season on Tuesday night to the 7-27 Charlotte Hornets.
Others: The article discusses the Phoenix Suns' struggles, particularly with their 'Big 3' lineup featuring Kevin Durant, Bradley Beal, and Devin Booker, and how they may need to consider a rebuild if they fail to acquire Jimmy Butler by the trade deadline.
